review: Our family owns 2 Roku players. When I saw the Amazon Fire Stick on sale over the holidays, it was too good of a deal to pass up. We are an AMAZON family and own several Kindles, so I knew that this would integrate well. We were not disappointed! It does everything our ROKU players do, but in a more 'user friendly' format. I like the graphics more and the ease of just plugging the stick into the back of the TV. No wires to deal with. What we love most, is that we can take the small Fire Stick with us on vacations and visiting friends. We have loved using this in hotels during our travels. It pairs up great with my Kindle Fire HDX and allows me to switch from my Kindle to the TV. The Android App for the Fire Stick is AMAZING! I can't believe how quick it works!  All in all, we are VERY pleased with our purchase.
